name: Untitled JRPG (Armanlone (Main))
description:
Basic JRPG

Itch Configurations:

  • Set to 'Manually Set Size'
  • Set Width and Height to 160x144 (or same aspect ratio: 320x388, 640x376)
  • Set the Orientation to 'Portrait'
  • Check the box beside 'Mobile Friendly'

Change Logs:

  1. RPG Movement
  2. Added temp backgrounds
  3. Added temp characters/bosses
  4. Added temp bgm
